StringTable.Label: GovernorTrait_SmartFriend_Dec
StringTable.String: Maintains a close relationship with an unbelievably brilliant friend from a foreign world.[BR][BR]+30% [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] when appointed Governor.

StringTable.Label: GovernorTrait_PirateEngineer_Dec
StringTable.String: Spent years as the chief engineer of a notorious pirate ship.[BR][BR]+10% [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and +5% [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] when appointed Governor.

StringTable.Label: GovernorTrait_PrisonEscapee_Dec
StringTable.String: Is known to have escaped a high-security prison colony; why they were there is unknown.[BR][BR]+20% [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] when appointed Governor.

StringTable.Label: GovernorTrait_FormerThrallCaptain_Dec
StringTable.String: A reformed thrall captain who once ruthlessly pushed those under their charge to the brink but now seeks redemption.

StringTable.Label: GovernorTrait_RuthlessTactician_Dec
StringTable.String: A tactician known for their effective but cruel methods.

StringTable.Label: GovernorTrait_PlagueSurvivor_Dec
StringTable.String: Survived a plague that resulted in the death of their loved ones and the quarantining of their old home.

StringTable.Label: GovernorTrait_InventedEnergySource_Dec
StringTable.String: Invented a new energy source quickly adopted across the Civilization.
